text: The 2015 season is Club Atlético River Plate's 4th consecutive season in the top-flight of Argentine football. The season began on February 13 and ended on December 6.2015.http://www.afa.org.ar/upload/reglamento/Reglamento_PrimeraDivision_2015.pdf (in spanish) ==Season events== On February 11, River Plate defeated San Lorenzo de Almagro and obtained the 2015 Recopa Sudamericana.http://www.conmebol.com/en/02112015-2347/river-plate-defeated- san-lorenzo-1-0-and-won-their-first-recopa-santander-sudamericana On May 19, River Plate introduced the new third kit, featuring shades of red and black.http://www.goal.com/es-ar/news/4454/f%C3%BAtbol- argentino/2015/05/21/11902522/river-present%C3%B3-su-nueva-camiseta- alternativa On July 3, River Plate lost to Rosario Central and was eliminated from the 2014-15 Copa Argentina at the Round of 32 stage.https://www.clarin.com/deportes/river-central- copa_argentina_0_H10b2UFwmx.html (in spanish) On August 5, River Plate defeated Tigres UANL and obtained the 2015 Copa Libertadores. On August 11, River Plate defeated Gamba Osaka at the Osaka Expo '70 Stadium and obtained the 2015 Suruga Bank Championship.http://www.conmebol.com/en/08112015-0831/copa-suruga-bank- tournament-river-plate-becomes-champion-while-routing-gamba-osaka-3-0 http://www.jfa.jp/eng/match/suruga_2015/news/00007055/ On December 16, River Plate made its debut on the FIFA Club World Cup, defeating Sanfrecce Hiroshima and qualifying to the 2015 FIFA Club World Cup Final.https://www.supersport.com/Football/world-club- cup/news/151216/River_scrape_into_Club_World_final On December 20, River Plate lost to FC Barcelona and ended the 2015 FIFA Club World Cup as runner- up.https://www.theguardian.com/football/live/2015/dec/20/club-world-cup-final- barcelona-river-plate-live ==Squad
